short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces President Trump with President Bannon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Based on the hit extension cloud-to-butt, this is a text replacement extension that shines a light on our current administration: all "Steve Bannon"s are now "President Bannon"s! All "President Trump"s are now "Donny Trump"s!

NOTES:

This extension currently works on most pages (dynamically-loading elements such as comments under an article may require a page refresh). It does not yet work on Facebook. Twitter hashtags sometimes come out funky. Future updates are planned to address these. Or, feel free to contribute at:

https://github.com/verascity/unpresidented
